channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- ActiveMQ Artemis
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- ActiveMQ Artemis

item.title: CVE-2020-10727|2024-08-04T11:14:14.722Z -- red%20hat -- activemq%20artemis
item.description: A flaw was found in ActiveMQ Artemis management API from version 2.7.0 up until 2.12.0, where a user inadvertently stores passwords in plaintext in the Artemis shadow file (etc/artemis-users.properties file) when executing the `resetUsers` operation. A local attacker can use this flaw to read the contents of the Artemis shadow file.
